animeDescription: In 2024, the computer network prevails throughout daily life. Sora Yuuki is a 14-year-old girl. One day, she is invited to an online game "The World". After an accident in the game, the real world begins to deform.
animeRelated: ['.hack//Sora: Sekai no Mukou ni', '.hack//Sign', '.hack//Versus: The Thanatos Report']
